flavorText:
"I preferred the harsh tutors—they made mischief all the more fun."
—Teferi, third-level student

foreignData.name: Gestrenger Schulmeister
foreignData.text: Wenn der Gestrenge Schulmeister ins Spiel kommt, bringe ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung Deiner Wahl zurück auf die Hand ihres Besitzers.

name: Stern Proctor
originalText: When Stern Proctor comes into play, return target artifact or enchantment to owner's hand.

rulings.text: If there is an artifact or enchantment on the battlefield (even your own) when this card enters the battlefield, you must return one to owner’s hand. If not, then simply ignore the “enters the battlefield” ability.
You can cast this card if there are no artifacts or enchantments on the battlefield.

text: When Stern Proctor enters the battlefield, return target artifact or enchantment to its owner's hand.
